alert.note: Alert for Nobles; Pipestone; Rock (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 7:10PM CDT until July 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Lyon County in northwestern Iowa... Rock County in southwestern Minnesota... Southwestern Nobles County in southwestern Minnesota... South central Pipestone County in southwestern Minnesota... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 709 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hardwick, or 8 miles north of Luverne, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Luverne and Blue Mounds State Park around 720 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Adrian, Ellsworth and Rushmore. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
